name: gsc-mcp
description: Google Search Console MCP Server - Access and manage Google Search Console data through MCP
author: sahksas

tools.name: list_sites
tools.description: List all sites in your Google Search Console account with their permission levels

tools.name: get_site
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific site in Search Console

siteUrl.description: The URL of the site (e.g., https://example.com/ or sc-domain:example.com)

tools.name: query_search_analytics
tools.description: Query comprehensive search analytics data including clicks, impressions, CTR, and average position

startDate.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (max 16 months ago)

metrics.description: Metrics to include in the results

rowLimit.description: Maximum number of rows to return (default: 1000, max: 25000)

tools.name: list_sitemaps
tools.description: List all sitemaps submitted for a site with their status

tools.name: get_sitemap
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific sitemap

tools.name: submit_sitemap
tools.description: Submit a new sitemap to Google Search Console

feedpath.description: The URL of the sitemap to submit

tools.name: delete_sitemap
tools.description: Delete a sitemap from Google Search Console

feedpath.description: The path to the sitemap to delete

tools.name: inspect_url
tools.description: Inspect a URL to see how Google sees it, including index status, mobile usability, and rich results

steps: Create a Google Cloud Project and enable Search Console API
Create a service account and download JSON key
Add service account to Search Console properties
